<style>

.main-container {
  max-width: 2000px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}

.banner {
  background-color: #1CBDED;
  display: flex;
  color: white;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-size: 3.5vw;
  flex: 1 1;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  justify-content: center;
  padding-top : 50px;
  padding-bottom: 50px;
  <!-- -webkit-animation-name: banner; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */ -->
  <!-- -webkit-animation-duration: 6s; /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */ -->
  <!-- animation-name: banner; -->
  <!-- animation-duration: 6s; -->
  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
}

<!-- /* Safari 4.0 - 8.0 */ -->
<!-- @-webkit-keyframes banner { -->
<!--     from {background-color: #1CBDED;} -->
<!--     to {background-color: #e8f8fd;} -->
<!-- } -->
<!-- /* Standard syntax */ -->
<!-- @keyframes banner { -->
<!--     from {background-color: #1CBDED;} -->
<!--     to {background-color: #e8f8fd;} -->
<!-- } -->

#error {
  animation: upper 8s linear infinite;
  color: white;
}

#code {
  opacity:.4;
  color: white;
  animation: lower 7s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes upper {
  0%,19.999%,22%,62.999%,64%, 64.999%,70%,100% {
    opacity:.99; text-shadow: 0 0 80px #ffffff,0 0 30px #008000,0 0 6px #0000ff;
  }
  20%,21.999%,63%,63.999%,65%,69.999% {
    opacity:0.4; text-shadow: none; 
  }
}

@keyframes lower {
  0%,12%,18.999%,23%,31.999%,37%,44.999%,46%,49.999%,51%,58.999%,61%,68.999%,71%,85.999%,96%,100% {
    opacity:0.99; text-shadow: 0 0 80px red,0 0 30px firebrick,0 0 6px darkred;
  }
  19%,22.99%,32%,36.999%,45%,45.999%,50%,50.99%,59%,60.999%,69%,70.999%,86%,95.999% { 
    opacity:0.4; text-shadow: none; 
  }
}

.topnav {
    background-color: #A0A0A0;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

/* Style the links inside the navigation bar */
.topnav a {
    float: left;
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 14px 16px;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-size: 1vw;
}

/* Change the color of links on hover */
.topnav a:hover {
    background-color: #C8C8C8;
    color: black;
}

/* Add a color to the active/current link */
.topnav a.active {
    background-color: #1CBDED;
    color: white;
}

.g-grid {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-left: -1rem;
  flex-flow: row wrap;
}

.g-grid-cell {
  flex: 1 1;
  background-color: white;
  margin-left: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 0.60rem;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #F5F5F5;
  border-width: thin;
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px 5px #888;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px 5px #888;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px 1px #F5F5F5;
}

.g-grid-cell:hover {
  border: 2px solid grey;
}

.desc-cell {
  flex: 1 1;
  background-color: #F8F8F8;
  margin-left: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
  -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px 5px #888;
  -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px 5px #888;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1px 1px #F5F5F5;
}

.desc {
    padding-top: 0.6vh;
    padding-bottom: 0.2vh;
    text-align: center;
    position: relative;
    font-size: 0.9vw;
    font-family: "Times New Roman";
}

.pictorial {
    position:relative;
    width:100%;
    height:100%;
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%); /* Safari 6.0 - 9.0 */
    filter: grayscale(100%);
}

.pictorial:hover {  
  filter: none;
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(0%);
}
}

</style>
